message.body: Are you busy? I have to ask you a question, call me
ill deff dooo it !! it sounds fun!! and see if theres exit signs!! ahahahah
Ahaha I'm serious... tickets were half off two weeks ago but no one wanted to go! I want to do it so bad
ughhh! maybe they will have another discount !!
Ok I found a site with a discount. Would only be $17 per ticket
yess thats perfect !!!!!!
and it will be good for my career alittle game ahaha
you always find good prices !! your soo good
Lol yea... I need to know a definite number of people going so I can see what dates are available
Does dawn definitely want to do it? Does joey definitely?
okaay !! my mom said no ! but joey said yes def
Ok so that's the two of you plus me. My brother said he would I'm just waiting for him to text me back bec ill get tickets now before the sale ends
okaaay!! sounds good
when u do it let me know the date so i can make sure i dont have work! and dont do it 4th of july cause ill be down the shore
Ok... looks like this site lets me buy the tickets now and pick the date when I want. I'll buy 4 tickets now and we'll see what day works for everyone.
Tickets expire November so have to go before then
oh okaaay thats goood !! so we have time
Yea
Tickets are bought
okay good !! yayy!!!!
